category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEAccountabilityMarkInBaseViewColor
preference.preference_description: Specifies the background color used by the Mark In Base View command in the Manufacturing Process Planner application to mark lines in the base view. Valid Values: Accepts a valid RGB (red green blue) code representing a color. This code represents any color as a combination of three digits, each of which is between 0 and 255. The three digits are separated by commas.
